subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Tyson Gay accepted a one-year suspension and returned his silver medal in the men’s 4x100-meter relay at the London Olympics after he tested positive for a prohibited substance.
snippet: The sprinter Tyson Gay accepted a one-year suspension and returned his silver medal in the men’s 4x100-meter relay at the London Olympics after he tested positive for a prohibited substance.
